properties.text: Differences and when to use what
Setting up a load balancer (HAProxy, Nginx ..)
Compiling apps from source (gcc, make and other related stuff)
awk, sed, grep, sort, uniq, cat, cut, echo, fmt, tr, nl, egrep, fgrep, wc ..etc
nmap, tcpdump, ping, traceroute, airmon, airodump ..etc
